basic sword.info: An ugly thing. It appears to be nothing more than a flat piece of steel attached to a handle.

basic shield.info: An awkward wooden shield that appears to be made out of... floorboards?

basic armor.info: An admittedly quite comfortable, but worn, padded leather gambeson.

steel claymore.info: A quite hefty two-handed sword. Notably sharp, but slightly unwieldy.

steel chainmail.info: Deceptively heavy, but quite easy to move in. Offers decent protection from lacerations.

steel heater shield.info: A light one-handed shield. Offers decent mobility and protection, but leaves some areas uncovered.

steel shortsword.info:
A light one-handed sword. Sacrifices the higher damage of a two-handed weapon for more mobility
and the ability to carry a shield.

Bane of The Undead.info: A sturdy two-handed sword. Very heavy, but well-balanced. The blade has an inscription that reads 'May this blade swing true and save me from peril'. It seems as though it did not work out for the previous owner.

Persuasion.info: A beautifully crafted one-handed sword. Where it lacks in might, it more than makes up for it in maneuverability.

Pyx Shield.info: An ornate kite shield with engravings and a painted front. While it is a bit heavy for a one-handed shield, it offers very good protection.

Maximillian Plate Armor.info: A suit of fluted plate armor. Decently easy to move in and quite functional despite being very heavy.

Cloak of Shadows.info:
A tight-fitting cloak. The cloth that it is woven from makes whatever is behind it appear invisible unless viewed
from a specific angle. While it lacks in defense, it could be quite useful in evading enemies.

The Law.info: A heavy two-handed sword that seems to feel like an extension of yourself.

Shield of Light.info: A golden shield that seems to glow slightly, even in the darkness of the dungeon.

Sword of Darkness.info: A bastard sword with a blackened blade. It whispers to you. Can you hear it?

Armor of Tarkir.info: A suit of armor forged of an unknown material. It is extremely strong, but also extremely light.
